title: Finance Minister Basil arrives in New Delhi
body_lines: Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa who is on a three-day official visit to India, arrived in New Delhi on Tuesday evening.
He was received in ICT hotel Delhi by High Commissioner of Sri Lanka Milinda Moragoda. Finance Secretary S.R. Attygalle accompanied Minister Rajapaksa.

The Sri Lankan Finance minister is scheduled to meet Indian External Affairs Minister Dr. S. Jaishankar, Finance and Corporate Affairs Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, Foreign Secretary Harsh Vardhan Shringla and Deputy National Security Advisor Vikram Misri in this visit.
